email_template.name: data_request_under_review
email_template.subject: [Ticket ID: {{ticket_id}}] Data Request from Public Sector Open Data Portal
email_template.content:
Dear {{name}},

Your request for data on **{{dataset_title}}** from {{agency}} has been reviewed by our moderators and is now live on our [Data Request page](https://data.gov.my/data-request) as a ticket Under Review.

To access it quickly, you may search for id:{{ticket_id}} on our [Data Request page](https://data.gov.my/data-request?ticket_id={{ticket_id}}).

Warm regards,

 ** _Public Sector Open Data Team  
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital_**
email_template.html_content:
Dear {{name}},

Your request for data on {{dataset_title}} from {{agency}} has been reviewed by our moderators and is now live on our Data Request page as a ticket Under Review.

To access it quickly, you may search for id:{{ticket_id}} on our Data Request page.

Warm regards,

Public Sector Open Data Team
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital

email_template.name: data_request_under_review
email_template.subject: [Tiket ID: {{ticket_id}}] Permohonan Set Data dari Portal Data Terbuka Sektor Awam
email_template.content:
Salam sejahtera {{name}},

Permohonan anda untuk data bertajuk **{{dataset_title}}** telah lulus semakan awal oleh moderator kami dan telah disenaraikan di [halaman Permohonan Data](https://data.gov.my/ms-MY/data-request) kami sebagai tiket “Dalam Tindakan”.

Sila semak permohonan anda menggunakan kata kunci id:{{ticket_id}} di [halaman Permohonan Data](https://data.gov.my/data-request?ticket_id={{ticket_id}}).

Sekian, terima kasih.

**_Admin Portal Data Terbuka Sektor Awam  
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital_**
email_template.html_content:
Salam sejahtera {{name}},

Permohonan anda untuk data bertajuk {{dataset_title}} telah lulus semakan awal oleh moderator kami dan dan telah disenaraikan di halaman Permohonan Data kami sebagai tiket “Dalam Tindakan”.

Sila semak permohonan anda menggunakan kata kunci id:{{ticket_id}} di halaman Permohonan Data.

Sekian, terima kasih.

Admin Portal Data Terbuka Sektor Awam
Jabatan Digital Negara, Kementerian Digital
